page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: The following pupils have taken part in the Fieldwork and Research for the Domesday project during the month of June 1985. {Pupils} Wendy Barber Mark Coutts Sharon Davies Michael Dunn Debbie Forsyth Alan Johnston Sandra Kinnon Geraldine McCann Sharon McEwan Susan Marr Scott Massie Mark Middleton Gary Morrison Kirsteen Morrison Tracy Morrison Jacqueline Philip Shauna Polson Sharon Riley Graham Robertson Sonia Rowson Neil Singer Chris Smith Paul Stanger Sean Stronach William Thomson Gary Tough Paul Vass Alison Walker {Staff}Bill Innes,Assistant Headteacher Jim McCracken - P.T. Geography Colin Mackenzie - P.T. History
